by.chmut.giftit.pool

Class ConnectionPool

  • java.lang.Object
    • by.chmut.giftit.pool.ConnectionPool

  • public class ConnectionPool
extends java.lang.Object
    The Connection pool class provides the creation of a pool of database connections, as well as the management of the provision and return connections into the pool
    Author:
    Sergei Chmut.
